properties.areaDesc: Lake Michigan from Grand Haven to Whitehall MI 5NM offshore to Mid Lake; Lake Michigan Michigan City IN to St. Joseph MI 5 NM offshore to mid-line of lake.; Lake Michigan from Port Washington to North Point Light WI 5NM offshore to Mid Lake; Lake Michigan from North Point Light to Wind Point WI 5NM offshore to Mid Lake; Lake Michigan from Whitehall to Pentwater MI 5NM offshore to Mid Lake; Lake Michigan from St Joseph to South Haven MI 5NM offshore to Mid Lake; Lake Michigan from Winthrop Harbor to Wilmette Harbor IL 5NM offshore to Mid Lake; Lake Michigan from Holland to Grand Haven MI 5NM offshore to Mid Lake; Lake Michigan from Sheboygan to Port Washington WI 5NM offshore to Mid Lake; Lake Michigan from South Haven to Holland MI 5NM offshore to Mid lake; Lake Michigan from Wilmette Harbor to Michigan City in 5NM offshore to Mid Lake; Lake Michigan from Wind Point WI to Winthrop Harbor IL 5NM offshore to Mid Lake
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 7 at 8:57PM CST until January 8 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Milwaukee/Sullivan WI
properties.description:
* WHAT...West gales up to 35 knots, becoming northwest to 40 knots
late in the evening. Waves 7 to 10 ft occasionally to 13 ft
building to 8 to 11 ft occasionally to 14 ft.

* WHERE...Southern half of the open waters of Lake Michigan.

* WHEN...Until 3 AM CST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST WEDNESDAY
